com.microblink.activity

Class VerificationFlowActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, AutofocusListener, MetadataListener, CameraEventsListener, OnActivityFlipListener, ScanResultListener

    public class VerificationFlowActivity
extends BaseVerificationFlowActivity
    Scan activity designed for scanning documents by using combined recognizers (CombinedRecognizerSettings). Scanning is performed in multiple steps, in each step single side/part of the document is being scanned.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static java.lang.String EXTRAS_INSTRUCTIONS_DOCUMENT_FIRST_SIDE
      String resource ID of the scan instructions that will be shown to the user as camera overlay during recognition of the first side of the document.

      • onCameraPreviewStarted

        public void onCameraPreviewStarted()
        Description copied from interface: CameraEventsListener
        Called just after camera preview has successfully started and no exceptions occurred. When this method is called, it means that from now on, frames will arrive and preview will be shown.
        Specified by:
        onCameraPreviewStarted in interface CameraEventsListener
        Overrides:
        onCameraPreviewStarted in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity

        protected void readAdditionalIntentExtras(@NonNull
                                          android.os.Bundle extras)
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        This method should be implemented to obtain activity's intent extras that are relevant to the derived activity. Method is called in BaseVerificationFlowActivity.onCreate(Bundle).

        extras - intent extras bundle obtained with getIntent().getExtras()

      • onCameraTorchSupportStatusAvailable

        protected void onCameraTorchSupportStatusAvailable(boolean cameraTorchSupported)
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        This method is called when camera preview is started and camera torch(flashlight) support status is available.
        Specified by:
        onCameraTorchSupportStatusAvailable in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Parameters:
        cameraTorchSupported - whether active camera supports torch(flashlight) or not.

      • createCombinedStepCameraOverlay

        @NonNull
protected android.view.View createCombinedStepCameraOverlay()
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Creates and returns camera overlay view for the combined verification step. This is appropriate place where references to all camera overlay subviews, that must be available later, should be obtained. This method is called after all intent extras has been read (after the BaseVerificationFlowActivity.readAdditionalIntentExtras(Bundle) hass been called).
        Specified by:
        createCombinedStepCameraOverlay in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Returns:
        created camera overlay view.

      • onStartCombinedFirstSide

        protected void onStartCombinedFirstSide(boolean isCameraPreviewStarted)
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Callback method that is called when combined recognizer is set to scan first side and recognition is started. This method is called after the combined step camera overlay has been created. This is appropriate place to make appropriate UI changes, e.g. show messages about started step/side, show splash screen, etc.
        Specified by:
        onStartCombinedFirstSide in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Parameters:
        isCameraPreviewStarted - whether camera preview has been already started or not. If the camera preview has not been started yet (value is false), method BaseVerificationFlowActivity.onCameraPreviewStarted() will be called when/if the camera is successfully started.

      • onStartCombinedSecondSide

        protected void onStartCombinedSecondSide(boolean isCameraPreviewStarted,
                                         BaseRecognitionResult combinedFirstSideResult)
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Callback method that is called when combined recognizer is set to scan second side (only if second side exists) and recognition is started. This method is called after the combined step camera overlay has been created. This is appropriate place to make appropriate UI changes, e.g. show messages about started step/side, show splash screen, etc.
        Specified by:
        onStartCombinedSecondSide in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Parameters:
        isCameraPreviewStarted - whether camera preview has been already started or not. If the camera preview has not been started yet (value is false), method BaseVerificationFlowActivity.onCameraPreviewStarted() will be called when/if the camera is successfully started.
        combinedFirstSideResult - recognition result for the first side of the combined document that has been scanned

      • setActivityTitle

        protected void setActivityTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the activity title in the action bar.
        Parameters:
        title - activity title.

      • onGlareStatus

        protected void onGlareStatus(boolean glareDetected)
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Callback that is called during recognition process when/if the glare is detected on the scanned document. This is appropriate place to perform UI updates and inform user that glare is detected (or that glare is not present any more).
        Specified by:
        onGlareStatus in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Parameters:
        glareDetected - whether glare is detected or not.

      • createAdditionalStepConfiguration

        protected BaseVerificationFlowActivity.AdditionalStepConfiguration createAdditionalStepConfiguration()
        Description copied from class: BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Creates configuration for the additional verification step that can be performed in the verification flow in addition to the combined recognizer step. This method is called from the BaseVerificationFlowActivity.onCreate(Bundle) after the BaseVerificationFlowActivity.readAdditionalIntentExtras(Bundle) has been called.
        Specified by:
        createAdditionalStepConfiguration in class BaseVerificationFlowActivity
        Returns:
        configuration for the additional verification step that can be performed in the verification flow in addition to the combined recognizer step, or null if the additional verification step is not needed. In that case additional step will not be performed.

      • clearSplashScreen

        protected void clearSplashScreen(boolean resumeScanning)
        Clears currently shown splash screen and resumes scanning if requested.
        Parameters:
        resumeScanning - whether resume scanning will be called or not.
